notes.long: Hi, I'm Meyoron Aghogho, a seasoned full-stack software engineer specializing in crafting and overseeing web applications. With a proven history of bringing projects to life, I handle everything from inception to planning, wireframing, user experience (UX) design, coding, SEO, optimizations, and ongoing maintenance. My work embodies modernity and adheres to industry standards, featuring rigorous unit and feature testing and efficient coding to guarantee a flawless user experience. My ultimate aim is to deliver a seamless and efficient user journey for my clients.

backend.note: As a backend engineer, I prioritize security and optimization in my work. I consistently conduct in-depth research on security best practices, optimal algorithms, and other relevant topics to ensure that my engineering is trustworthy, safe, and secure. My commitment to following best practices and staying up-to-date on industry developments allows me to deliver high-quality, reliable solutions to my clients.
backend.title: Backend Engineer

frontend.note: I have extensive experience using powerful modern UI frameworks to bring stunning application designs to life. My ability to effectively utilize these tools allows me to create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces that enhance the overall user experience.
frontend.title: Frontend Developer

mentorship.note: In addition to my own personal and professional growth, I am deeply committed to helping others in the tech industry attain mastery in their fields. Watching others grow and succeed is just as important to me as my own growth and development. I am dedicated to supporting and mentoring my colleagues, and I take pride in being able to share my knowledge and experience with those around me.
mentorship.title: Tech Mentorship

mobile.note: I build well optimized and seasoned mobile apps, be it for android, ios, and laptops. I prioritize proper optimisations delivered with sleek modern and scalable UIs
